AgendaItems.Title: Confirmation of the Minutes of 23rd Meeting
AgendaItems.Details: Minutes of the 23rd Finance Committee meeting held on February 27, 2014, were circulated and confirmed.

AgendaItems.Title: Action Taken on the Decision of the 23rd Meeting
AgendaItems.Details: The action taken report was noted.

AgendaItems.Title: Financial Status of the Institute as on April 25, 2014
AgendaItems.Details: Finance Committee noted the present financial status and requirement of funds under Plan and Non-Plan schemes.

AgendaItems.Title: Annual Budget for 2014-15
AgendaItems.Details: Finance Committee perused and approved the Annual Budget for Plan outlay Rs. 35700.00 lakhs and Non-Plan outlay Rs. 8050.00 lakhs with observations: (A) Plan funds categorized as Immediate and Priority; (B) Non-Plan salaries utilized on actual expenses basis.

AgendaItems.Title: Physical & Financial Statement of ongoing construction works/projects
AgendaItems.Details: Finance Committee noted progress and emphasized completion of advanced buildings, furnishing priority, realistic fund projection for ongoing projects, and prioritization of new works based on availability of funds.

AgendaItems.Title: Medical Reimbursement Claim of Dr. Rabindranath Barman
AgendaItems.Details: Approved reimbursement claim of Rs. 1,96,269/- for treatment of his wife, limited to CGHS rates as per Ministry of Health & Family Welfare OM No.Z.15025/5/2011-CGHS III/CGHS(P) dated 22nd Nov 2011.

AgendaItems.Title: Sanction of amount for cancellation charges (TEQIP-II)
AgendaItems.Details: Finance Committee observed that reimbursement of cancellation charges of Rs. 25,454.00 is not admissible.

AgendaItems.Title: Present Status of TEQIP-II Project
AgendaItems.Details: Coordinator presented the current status of TEQIP-II Project; Finance Committee noted the status.

FinanceCommitteeMinutes.Closure: Meeting ended with a vote of thanks to the Chair.
